OOC: My E-Maile is down, so I'm useing the egroups post feature.

::Demolition::

He sees energy fire begin. He comes out of hid hiding spot, and opens 
fire on Angel Prime.

::Hot Rod::

Ten rapid laser shots strike near, two of them hitting him.
"Lets the games begin!"
He launches a rocket at the area he saw the lasers come from. He 
would have to rely on this method, since he could only barely see the 
Alliance.
